#summary IMDB Metadata Providers

There are currently 2 IMDB Providers.  Both offer different levels of functionality, but it recommened that you use the default one.

= Default IMDB Provdider (imdb) =
 * Fetches IMDB Title Page Only
 * Fast
 * Limited Actor List
 * Limited Plot Information
 * Works with --auto switch

= Nielm's IMDB Provider (nielm_imdb) =
 * Fethes IMDB Title page and additional pages
 * A Little Slow (because of the extra page fetching)
 * Complete Actor List
 * Complete Plot Information
 * No Studio
 * No Directors
 * No Writers
 * No Aspect Ratio
